title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 53.5 - Exchange of articles between visitor and inmate
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 53.5 - Exchange of articles between visitor and inmate

State Regulations

Close observation shall be maintained to prevent any article
being passed to or from a visitor and inmate, especially when they greet each
other. Papers or other articles to be exchanged between a visitor and inmate
must first be inspected and approved by the principal keeper. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
53.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
